settings.details:
360 Cookware is making heirloom quality cookware and bakeware in the most ethical and environmental manner possible. Sourcing the highest grades of materials possible,bending and finishing them only by the hands of true veteran craftspeople. The mirrored finish is achieved entirely by a mechanical process. No chemicals are used from start to finish.

As an affiliate, you can earn money promoting and driving sales for 360 Cookware.  

Commissions start at 10% of all sales generated by the links you place on your website or social media posts.

settings.title: How Does It Work?
settings.details:
When you join our Affiliate Program, you will have access to a range of banners and unique tracking links that can be placed within your website, blog, social media posts or email. When a user clicks on one of those links, they will be brought to our website and their activity will be tracked by the ShareASale platform. 

For each sale made through your links, a commission will be earned based on your commission level.

settings.title: How Much Do I Get Paid and When?
settings.details:
• Commissions start at 10% of sales
  • All sales you make are tracked for 30 days.
  • Payments are made monthly net 30 for the previous month.

settings.title: Ready to join?
settings.details:
The 360 Cookware Affiliate Program is managed via the ShareASale platform. 

Please click here to join now.

settings.title: Still Have Questions?
settings.details: If you still have questions, please contact us at affiliate@360cookware.com and we will get right back to you.
